Preference.app:title: Configure bonded device
Preference.app:summary: Click here to go to the android settings to pair a device. Paired devices will then be shown in the list below. If you have multiple devices, you can select which should be used, otherwise the device that connects first is used.

Preference.app:title: Test Mooltipass Device Connection
Preference.app:summary: Please enable Bluetooth and be sure to have the ble device paired before testing the connection.
